mapper.select: select prdt_genre, prdt_name, (prdt_currenttotal/prdt_goal)*100 as "prdt_percent", prdt_currenttotal, (prdt_enddate-prdt_opendate) as "prdt_dday", row_number() over(order by (prdt_currenttotal/prdt_goal)*100 desc) from tb_product where prdt_opendate <= current_date and current_date-7 <= prdt_opendate limit 3
